name: Coconut Survival
description:
I developed this game entirely from scratch (no template, absolutely nothing) in the Godot game engine for the Mini Jam 53 - Oasis in 3 days without any preparation beforehand. The only things that I didn't create were the sounds and the game engine itself. I wanted to preserve the aspect of the game jam, which in my opinion is about not preparing anything before the countdown starts.

Creating this game on my own without anyone to help me was a real challenge due to my slowness, but even if the game is a bit bugged and not as I wanted, it is right there! I had to make VERY harsh decisions to get everything "done" in time, so I'm sorry if the game isn't as good as you expected. I'm still happy to have made a procedural generated map (trees, rocks, and even clouds are randomly generated) even if it's very far from being as I wanted it to be.

So please remember, I made it in 3 days only, but I hope you will still enjoy it! :)

CREDITS:

"Fidayda" by Turku Nomads of the Silk Road :

https://files.freemusicarchive.org/storage-freemusicarchive-org/music/WFMU/Turku...

Sounds (modified) used in the game:

http://soundbible.com/royalty-free-sounds-1.html

Stay alive as long as you can. Good luck!
